Başkasının varlığına, yaşamına, özgürlüklerine müdahale/yasaklama/cezalandırma içeren tüm söz, eylem ve davranışlar nefret söylemidir. Ben türbanlı kadını başını açmaya zorlayacak söylem ve eylem göstermiyorsam o da benim yaşam biçimime müdahale edecek bir söylem veya eylem göstermeyecektir. Beğenmeyebilir, eleştirebilir ama bana zorla başımı örtmemi sağlamayı amaçlayan baskı oluşturacak bir söylem, eylem tamamen nefret içeriklidir. Herkes yek diğerinin hakkına saygı göstermelidir.
hate_definition_cleaned: All kinds of words, actions and behaviors that threaten a group and interfere with the group's life, that will trigger a collective reaction against this group, and that may endanger the human rights and freedoms of the group in question are hate speech. Everyone should respect each other's ideas and opinions. However, all kinds of words, actions and behaviors that endanger individuals or groups who are unable to protect themselves and call for intervention against them must be kept under control by the authorities. So, for example, you cannot legally ban child marriage and then support those who legitimize child rape for political gains because the child cannot protect himself. Or you cannot allow the organization of an anti-LGBTQ hate march in the heart of Istanbul because this group has limited power to protect itself. All words, actions and behaviors that involve interfering with/prohibiting/punishing someone else's existence, life and freedom are hate speech. If I do not show any discourse or action that will force the veiled woman to uncover her head, she will not show any discourse or action that will interfere with my way of life. He may not like it, he may criticize it, but any discourse or action that will put pressure on me and force me to cover my head is completely hateful. Everyone should respect each other's rights.

hate_definition:
जब हम एक-दूसरे पर नाराज होते हैं तो शब्दों की मर्यादा टूट जाती है। लेकिन सही मायनों में अभद्र भाषा क्या है, इसे समझने के लिए हमें प्रकृति और संस्कृति के बीच का फर्क समझना होगा।

अक्सर जब भी लोग इसका सामना करते हैं तो उन्हें चेताया जाता है। फिर भी, ऐसे रिवाज तो हैं जिनमें आप देवता को अपशब्द कह सकते हैं। इसे निंदा-स्तुति कहा जाता है।

आप जितनी कडी निंदा करना चाहते हैं उतने घृणित शब्दों का प्रयोग करते हैं। इस अभ्यास का तार्किक उद्देश्य भाव-विरेचन है। अपने शरीर से नकारात्मक ऊर्जा को बाहर निकालना। ईश्वर इस तरह की निंदा स्वीकार कर लेते हैं। मनोवैज्ञानिक रूप से देखा जाए तो यह सुरक्षा वॉल्व है।
hate_definition_cleaned: When we are angry at each other, words are out of bounds. But to understand what hate speech really is, we need to understand the difference between nature and culture. Usually, when people encounter it, they are warned. Still, there are rituals where you can abuse a deity. This is called ninda-stuti. You use as many hateful words as you want to abuse. The logical purpose of this practice is catharsis. To release negative energy from your body. The deity accepts this kind of abuse. Psychologically, it is a safety valve.

hate_definition: किसी व्यक्ति, समाज और राष्ट्र का अपमान करने वाली बातेँ कहते हुए ये सोचना चाहिए कि आपको भी वैसा ही जवाब मिलेगा.
hate_definition_cleaned: While saying things that insult any person, society or nation, you should think that you will get the same response.

hate_definition: अभद्र भाषा किसी विचार की अभिव्यक्ति में उन शब्दों के प्रयोग का होना है जिसे समाज उचित न समझता हो या उस व्यक्ति को भी उचित न लगे जिसे उस मुद्दे से कोई सरोकार न हो।
hate_definition_cleaned: Hate speech is the use of words to express an idea that may not be considered appropriate by society or even by a person who is not concerned with the issue.

hate_definition: जब हमारी बातों से किसी भी व्यक्ति, संस्था,समाज के लोगो को ठेस पहुंचाता है तो वही अभद्र भाषा है इसलिए ऐसा नहीं करना चाहिए
hate_definition_cleaned: When our words hurt any person, organization or society, then it is abusive language, so we should not do this.

hate_definition: गाली , जातिगत भेदभाव , देश के प्रति घृणित टिप्पणी , महिला के प्रति अपमानजनक टिप्पणी , बुजुर्गों का अपमान , किसी भी व्यक्ति पर अपमानजनक टिप्पणी,,,

hate_definition_cleaned: Abusive language such as abuse against God, abuse against family members, death threats, and liberal remarks come under the category of abusive language.

hate_definition: उन शब्दों की समाजिक मान्यता न हो ऐसे शब्द अभद्र भाषा कहलाते हैं या उन शब्दो का प्रयोग आपके लिए किया जाय तो आप कैसा महसूस करते हैं इस पर भी निर्भर करता है हो सकता है यही आपका संस्कार हो।
hate_definition_cleaned: If those words do not have social acceptance, such words are called abusive language or if those words are used for you then how you feel depends on it, maybe this is your sanskar.

hate_definition: Kisi bhi vyaktivishesh ya jati ya dharm ya ling ya kisi bhi samuh ko man par ya unki bhavna ko thes pahochne vale shabd ko ya vaky ya ese vicharo ko prakat karna ya gali galoch karna abhadra bhasha kahlati hai...
hate_definition_cleaned: Expressing such thoughts or saying such words or sayings which offend the mind of any personality or caste or religion or gender or any group or which reach their feelings is called obscene language...

hate_definition: किसी भी सार्वजनिक मीडिया प्लेटफॉर्म पर किसी को अपमानित करने के लिए प्रयोग किये गए शब्द और अपशब्द ही अभद्र भाषा है
hate_definition_cleaned: Hate speech is any word or abusive language used to insult someone on any public media platform

hate_definition_cleaned: Which is beyond facts and tries to force its views on others. Or directly threatens.

hate_definition_cleaned: Abusing any person on social media. Giving provocative speeches against any community which encourage violence. Running propaganda by putting minorities in the dock. Spreading unrest among the people of the country and spreading religious anarchy also comes under indecent behavior.

hate_definition: जो किसी की मां बहन को धमकी देने मारने की बात करता हो देख लेने की बात करता हो मन में प्रताड़ित की भावना रखते हुए कोई भी ऐसे अश्लील शब्द कहे अमान्य हो और जो दूसरे के धर्म को नीचा दिखाता हो
hate_definition_cleaned: Anyone who threatens to kill someone's mother or sister, talks about taking revenge, says any such obscene words with a feeling of oppression in his mind and who degrades the religion of others is unacceptable.

hate_definition: मेरी राय में जिस भाषा के कारण कोई अनावश्यक तौर पर व्यग्तिगत रूप से अपमानित महसूस करे तो यह अभद्रता कहलाती है।
hate_definition_cleaned: In my opinion, any language which makes someone feel unnecessarily insulted personally, is called indecency.

hate_definition_cleaned: The language which is obscene and abusive, which falls in the category of abuses, is obscene. It cannot be used in front of the family and which should not scare anyone. Such should be the language. The language which hurts any community or religious sentiments is obscene.

hate_definition_cleaned: Language that is explicitly designed to cause actual harm, for example, encouraging self-harm or encouraging or instructing others to harm the person in question, or language that causes harm by trying to denigrate a person based on their perceived group identity.

hate_definition_cleaned: Vulgar language is an insulting language. It is a form of mental violence. Hence it is indecent. Language structure is very important in expressing thoughts. Vulgar language contaminates the sentiments.

hate_definition_cleaned: Anything which is something out of practice, obscene vulgar or diminishes the social, religious, democratic image of the society

hate_definition_cleaned: Hate speech is that which insults and hurts the dignity, caste or any particular person by making negative comments on him/her. It is called hate speech.
